data.originalMessage: Yesterday I talked to sara parker, she said that my package did not arrive in Kalamazoo, but was sent to lafeyette instead. So said that I should get in touch with herb and he will help me. My order number is #567890. Can you please help me track my package? I'm really frustrated

languageDetection.translation: Yesterday I talked to sara parker, she said that my package did not arrive in Kalamazoo, but was sent to lafeyette instead. So said that I should get in touch with herb and he will help me. My order number is #567890. Can you please help me track my package? I'm really frustrated

data.intentAnalysis: The customer is contacting customer service to request assistance with tracking their package.
